Title: A Paying Ghost
Actors: Spruha Joshi, Umesh Kamat, Mahesh Manjrekar, Atul Parchure
Plot: A Paying Ghost (PG) is a story based on a famous novel ''Badali'' authored by Vasant Kale Madhav works for multi national and is an honest worker who never says no to whatever anyone wants him to do.Thus he is troubled by everyone
